---
category: news
title: "IIT Roorkee Alumnus Wins Zinnov Award For Contribution To Artificial Intelligence"
excerpt: "Dr Sunil Kumar Vuppala, an IIT Roorkee alumnus, has won the Zinnov Award 2020 for his contribution to the field of Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Data Analytics. The objective of the award is to recognize the contribution of individuals as well as organizations that have enabled business continuity driven innovation along with diversity."
